body: Bootleg summary: Basically the blackmail part comes from how she cheats even when the husband isn't involved now. Like in chapter 2 and how she never told him she banged all those dudes at the hotspring, the only reason he knew is cuz he happened to wake up. So basically the dude has leverage on her with her cheating and the husband's job. She doesn't really care tho since 1 more man doesn't matter at this point.  Idk wtf goin on with that jk shit she on tho

So what i still don't understand is the wife are actual jk or just like to pretend to be a jk by wearing uniform. Then are they actually married or just pretending to be married. Then the husband is a cuck or just don't care the wife bitching herself.

@kcjpunk that's what I thought too. Perhaps the wife was sleeping with the kid multiple times without the husband knowing? I guess we're gonna need for someone to translate the Manager dialogue because he must have said something. I dont mind it going full NTR (infact I was looking forward to Manager chapter) but this doesn't really make sense lol.

@sadboi22 i understand that part, but did she really get blackmailed?  In Part 3, didn't the manager ask for the husband to have her seduce the kid? Didn't she discuss it with his husband and  they both agree to seduce the boy? Unless it means that she did it again with the kid/became sexfriend with the kid, maybe? Anyways, it seems that the manager is gonna keep doing it with her. I wonder how much longer this will continue.
the wife got blackmailed by his boss by the photo he got from part 3 (when wife go to hotel with shota) so to compensate... you know the rest
FINALLY, IT'S HERE. It looks like it went Netorare this time. Seems like the manager is gonna keep doing this with her. Anybody wanna translate/give a gist of what's going on?
